title: Slice Keyboard Version 1.1
summary: Version 1.1 of Slice Keyboard aims to make typing faster and more fluid and fix a couple of bugs.

parts.content:
Version 1.1 of Slice Keyboard aims to make typing faster and more fluid. The touch area of the keys are at the open size even before the opening animation has completed. Logic of opening and closing keys has been improved. Keys that are being closed are immediately set inactive and any keys behind them are activated even before the closing animation has completed.

This release also fixes a bug preventing double tap to capitalize and character repeat from always working.
